tooltipContent.title: Analytics Cookies
tooltipContent.text: Analytics cookies collect data about website usage, helping site owners understand visitor behavior and improve their online experience. These cookies are essential for measuring site performance and user engagement.

tooltipContent.title: Destination
tooltipContent.text: Marketing cookies track user behavior to deliver personalized ads and content, enhancing the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.

tooltipContent.title: Save Preferences
tooltipContent.text: The 'Save Preferences' button allows users to store their cookie settings, ensuring their choices are remembered for future visits to the website.
